ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] emergency: please read regarding new bard songs
ygData.msgSnippet: ... There are several undead it doesn t work on.  Dunno if that included barbed bones, but it definitely doesn t work on your plain old low level skeleton.
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 21 Mar 2000, Alex Candelaria wrote:
>
> FYI: For all those claiming that Invis works great in Unrest, you forgot
> this one caveat: Our invis song does not work on Barbed Bone skele's.

There are several undead it doesn't work on. Dunno if that
included barbed bones, but it definitely doesn't work on your
plain old low level "skeleton."

What we need is for an enchanter or wizard to wander through
Unrest with their plain old invis on and report if it works
against hags, skeletal monks, carrion ghouls, etc.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
